attributes.action: Stop refugees coming across the English Channel
attributes.additional_details: Give the people  their country back
attributes.background: We are out of Europe treatie of 1995

rejection.details:
Under international law, it is legal for a person to apply for asylum in any country that has signed the 1951 Geneva Convention and to remain there until the authorities have assessed their claim.

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to withdraw from international treaties that give people the right to seek asylum in the UK, if that's what you'd like to happen.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Take action to address the problem of illegal attempts to reach the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334089
